sectionText: A beginning workshop in the preparation and production of studio broadcast television newscast. Students explore the nature and pacing of studio production by preparing, rehearsing and producing TV Newscast. Students will meet in a Monday lecture and then be assigned a Tuesday, Wednesday or Thursday JOUR 445 lab, where they will run production positions for the UI7 newscasts during the spring semester. If seats remain, the course will open to campus Freshmen and Sophomores on November 18 at 11am.
sectionNotes: Restricted to Journalism major(s). Restricted to students with Freshman or Sophomore class standing.
